xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/451943-Buster Keaton: The Genius Destroyed by Hollywood 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ypigsVrQMLdcLBoinjjtNYZfXb4.jpg In 1926, Buster Keaton was at the peak of his glory and wealth. By 1933, he had reached rock bottom. How, in the space of a few years, did this uncontested genius of silent films, go from the status of being a widely-worshipped star to an alcoholic and solitary fallen idol? With a spotlight on the 7 years during which his life changed, using extracts of Keatonâ€™s films as magnifying mirrors, the documentary recounts the dramatic life of this creative genius and the Hollywood studios. Buster Keaton: The Genius Destroyed by Hollywood
